channel.title: Posts on mckoss.com | Mike Koss
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on mckoss.com | Mike Koss

item.title: The Paper Enigma
item.description: This paper simulator of a German Enigma machine is 100% compatible with the real thing; you can send and receive messages between the Paper Enigma and the WWII-era cryptography machine.

item.title: Revamping mckoss.com
item.description:
The history of mckoss.com and it's conversion to a statically generated
web site.
